meta_description: A museum of ideas, striving to offer meaningful art and cultural experiences while fostering new knowledge in the visual arts.
hours_text:
# Plan Your Visit

### Gallery and Shop Hours

Tuesday | 10 am to 6 pm  
Wednesday | 10 am to 6 pm  
Thursday | 10 am to 8 pm  
Friday | 10 am to 6 pm  
Saturday | 10 am to 6 pm  
Sunday | 10 am to 6 pm  
Closed Mondays and national holidays

### Perenn at the Museum

Hours of Operation  
Tuesday – Sunday | 8 am – 2:30 pm

### Admission

Members FREE  
General Admission $15  
Students and Seniors $13  
[Free Student Admission Programs](https://www.nevadaart.org/learn/ongoing-programs/free-student-admission/)  
– Nevada High School Students with Student ID FREE  
– Students from TMCC, WNC and UNR with Student ID FREE  
Children (6 to 12 years) $3  
Children (5 and under) FREE

  * [ Plan Your Visit ](https://www.nevadaart.org/visit/plan-your-visit/)
    * [ Shop ](https://www.nevadaart.org/visit/plan-your-visit/shop/)
    * [ Perenn at the Museum ](https://www.nevadaart.org/visit/plan-your-visit/dining-at-perenn/)
    * [ Accessibility ](https://www.nevadaart.org/visit/plan-your-visit/accessibility/)
    * [ FAQ ](https://www.nevadaart.org/visit/plan-your-visit/faq/)
  * [ Host an Event ](https://www.nevadaart.org/visit/host-an-event/)
  * [ About the Museum ](https://www.nevadaart.org/visit/about-the-museum/)

## Getting Here

### Location

The Museum is located at [160 West Liberty Street](https://www.google.com/maps/place/Nevada+Museum+of+Art/@39.520776,-119.8133,17z/data=!3m1!4b1!4m2!3m1!1s0x809940c9ea4d32c1:0xacf68f6b2f0dbd81 "Nevada Museum of Art") in downtown Reno, Neva...

[ VISIT Free Student Admission Programs Students are always free. Your student ID is your no-cost admission ticket to a world of unique resources and creative happenings.  ](https://www.nevadaart.org/learn/ongoing-programs/free-student-admission/)

[ YOUTUBE CHANNEL WATCH VIDEOS View more than 200 videos from talks, events, Art + Environment Conferences, and exhibitions.  ](https://www.youtube.com/c/NevadaArt)

[ SYMPOSIUM 2026 Art + Environment Summit Together with the backdrop exhibition Into the Time Horizon, the 2026 Art + Environment Summit: Under Pressure brings together artists, writers...  ](https://www.nevadaart.org/2026summit/)

[ Group Tours Guided Tour January 17, 2026 11 am – noon Enrich your experience with a guided tour. A docent will guide you through the galleries, offering insight and history to the artwork...  ](https://www.nevadaart.org/event/guided-tour-843/)
